title: He Came Home The Next Day With A Clean Shirt On
itunes:title: He Came Home The Next Day With A Clean Shirt On
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 29 year old woman and I’ve been engaged for 2 years. I’ve never questioned my man’s loyalty to me and in the 5 years total that we’ve been together, I don’t think he’s ever cheated on me. We live together and I have all of his passwords to his phones, social media accounts and his checking account. He has all of mine too.............

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 29 year old woman and I’ve been engaged for 2 years. I’ve never questioned my man’s loyalty to me and in the 5 years total that we’ve been together, I don’t think he’s ever cheated on me. We live together and I have all of his passwords to his phones, social media accounts and his checking account. He has all of mine too.............
